termcolor

Class Movement

  • java.lang.Object
    • termcolor.Movement

  • public class Movement
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for manipulating the cursor location and clearing parts of the terminal contents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Movement() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void clearRestOfLine()
      Clear the rest of the line that the cursor is on.
      static void clearScreen()
      Clear the screen and move the cursor to the top left.
      static void setCursorDown(int numTimes)
      Move the cursor down n rows.
      static void setCursorLeft(int numTimes)
      Move the cursor left n columns.
      static void setCursorRight(int numTimes)
      Move the cursor right n columns.
      static void setCursorTo(int x, int y)
      Move the cursor to a specific row and column.
      static void setCursorUp(int numTimes)
      Move the cursor up n rows.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • setCursorUp

        public static void setCursorUp(int numTimes)
        Move the cursor up n rows.
        Parameters:
        numTimes - the number of rows to move up by

        public static void setCursorDown(int numTimes)
        Move the cursor down n rows.
        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • setCursorTo

        public static void setCursorTo(int x,
                               int y)
        Move the cursor to a specific row and column.
        Parameters:
        x - the row to move the cursor to, starts with 0.
        y - the column to move the cursor to, starts with 0.
